definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

sentences.english: Many million years ago the territory of the present Perm region was occupied by the Perm Sea.
sentences.chinese: 现在的彼尔姆地区在数百万年前还属于彼尔姆海。

sentences.english: My master went back to his friends and we took the boat out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 主人回到他的朋友们那儿去了，我们坐船出了海。

sentences.english: The sea is the immensity of wretchedness.
A Nereid, goddess of the sea and the wife of Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 海中仙女，海的女神，波塞顿之妻。

sentences.english: A Nereid, goddess of the sea and the wife of Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 海中仙女，海的女神，波塞顿之妻。

sentences.english: The surface of the sea seems to be an invisible membrane between the water and the air.
sentences.chinese: 海的表面似乎是隔在水与空气间的一层看不见的薄膜。

sentences.english: Nereid, goddess of the sea and the wife of Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 海中仙女，海的女神，波塞冬之妻。

sentences.english: Nereid, goddess of the sea and the wife of Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 海中仙女，海的女神，波塞冬之妻。

sentences.english: They watched the rain pit the sea with tiny craters.
sentences.chinese: 他们注视着雨滴在海上面砸出的小水窝。

sentences.english: This method can be used in coast based radar for detecting weak targets in sea clutter.
sentences.chinese: 该方法可以用于岸基对海雷达检测海表面微弱目标。

sentences.english: A sea of troubles, nothing moving part, the sand beach also is bad.
sentences.chinese: 远望了一下海，没有什么动人之处，沙滩的沙也不好。

sentences.english: Sea to the south and west.
sentences.chinese: 而南部和西部是塔斯曼海。

sentences.english: Heidegger revealed the necessity for explicitly restating the question of Being.
sentences.chinese: 海德格的诠释现象学揭露了重提存有问题的必要性。

sentences.english: It is pointed out that the most important measure is to select properly and correctly the material.
sentences.chinese: 指出海水管系防腐蚀的措施，主要是合理选材。

sentences.english: Today is day 3 of The Heist‘s reign, and sales are quickening.
sentences.chinese: 今天是海斯特主导排名的第三天，销售还在加快。

sentences.english: Haynes wasn't the first neuroscientist to explore unconscious decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 海恩斯并非第一个探究无意识思考决策的神经学家。

definition: East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
sail/Taiwan pr. [fan2], except 帆布[fan1 bu4] canvas
